definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">player_log_in</field><next><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Type /instructions into chat and press enter to open the manual, and /goals to open the goal menu.</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></next></block></xml>
